title: Total War Shogun 2 my way
description:
Here are 5 folders from First to Fifth step, How i made it work. Fall of the Samurai and Rise of the Samurai are working without problems or any crash. Make sure you have your antivirus turned off, crack v2 is false positive.

Anyway before this, your Shogun 2 should be blocked in firewall, also make sure you have installed NET4 framework, directx, and new realtek audio driver.

If you have 32-bit system and you got more than 3 GB ram, you should also check this twcenter(.)net/forums/showthread.php?238484-quot-Insufficient-memory-quot-amp-quot-CTD-quot-workaround
